title: Kalista is still weak....
body: YO RITO! YEA KALISTA IS SLOW AS SHIIIT! EARLY GAME SHE JUST TOOOOO DAMN SLOW. HER AA ANIMATION MAKES HER EVEN MORE SLOW! I MEAN I GET THAT I HAVE TO BUY ITEMS TO MAKE HER GOOD BUT U WONT BE GETTING GOLD WITH THAT SLOW ASSS AA ANIMATION! U NEED TO BE REALLY PERFECT AND HAVE A GOOD SUPPORT. ;/

replies.body: ADCs are weak in general atm.
shes the weakest of them all
she's gonna stay that way until they remove her cancer lemur passive

> [{quoted}](name=JZ Jora,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2RL6hWcy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-08T00:12:32.084+0000)
>
> she's gonna stay that way until they remove her cancer lemur passive

so make her worse then olaf'd?

> [{quoted}](name=JZ Jora,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2RL6hWcy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-08T00:12:32.084+0000)
>
> she's gonna stay that way until they remove her cancer lemur passive

honestly i have no problem with her passive it makes her unique and interesting while also making her hard to use, my problem is the fact she has a malphite ultimate in her toolkit. CC at that level should never be allowed to be given to a adc.
twitch has perma invi... fck outta here. he buttfucks you from behind.
